Trinity::

She cried and her cry could be heard down the halls of the ship.
She roared and whimpered.  The tears rolled down her cheeks. "Thier 
dead."  she cried, and burried her face into Archangle's side as he 
held her. " I miss my mom." She felt scared and alone.  Her new 
Predacon program told her not to trust this bot on anything, but then 
again, she didn't know what else to do. Her family were all dead, 
killed in the crash of the ship.  She was the only one left, out of a 
four hundred bot crew, she was the only surviver.  She was starting 
to feel guiltly about living when her family didn't. She cried and 
whimpered. "I'm sorry mom.  I hope you can hear me, I'm sorry." She 
cried even harder, her tiny spark, breaking.
